com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.form

Interface Field

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultField

    public interface Field
    A form field, to be used when rendering views and processing form submissions.
    Since:
    1.0.RC3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getLabel()
      Form field label.
      String getName()
      The form field name.
      String getPlaceholder()
      Form field value placeholder text.
      String getType()
      Returns the form field type, for example, text, password, hidden, etc.
      String getValue()
      The form field value.
      boolean isAutofocus()
      Returns true if the form field should be autofocused during view rendering, false otherwise.
      boolean isRequired()
      Returns true if the form field is required to be populated by the end user, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        The form field name.
        Returns:
        form field name.

      • getValue

        String getValue()
        The form field value.
        Returns:
        form field value.

      • getLabel

        String getLabel()
        Form field label. This value is usually an i18n message key instead of a raw language value. This allows the view rendering to reference a message library using the return value as an i18n key for internationalized rendering.
        Returns:
        field label, usually an i18n message key for i18n-capable view rendering.

      • getPlaceholder

        String getPlaceholder()
        Form field value placeholder text. This value is usually an i18n message key instead of a raw language value. This allows the view rendering to reference a message library using the return value as an i18n key for internationalized rendering.
        Returns:
        field value placeholder text, usually an i18n message key for i18n-capable view rendering.

      • isRequired

        boolean isRequired()
        Returns true if the form field is required to be populated by the end user, false otherwise. When rendered in an html form, this would enable the field element's required="required" attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the form field is required to be populated by the end user, false otherwise.

      • isAutofocus

        boolean isAutofocus()
        Returns true if the form field should be autofocused during view rendering, false otherwise. A true value indicates that the text cursor should be placed in the form field immediately so the user can start filling out the form without having to click into the text field. When rendered in an html form, this would enable the field element's autofocus="autofocus" attribute.

        Because only one field in a form can be auto-focused, if more than one field specifies a true value, only the first one will be autofocused.

        Returns:
        true if the form field should be autofocused during view rendering, false otherwise.

      • getType

        String getType()
        Returns the form field type, for example, text, password, hidden, etc.
        Returns:
        the form field type, for example, text, password, hidden, etc.
